feed.title: Lodestone Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lodestone: Lodestone v0.4.2
entry.content:
Downloads

  • Windows Installer
  • Windows Standalone
  • .dmg (known UI issues)
  • .deb
  • .AppImage (unstable)

Notable Changes

This release includes a new design, added support for Forge and Paper, and improved the underlying infrastructure for a smoother experience.

  • Refactor to new Error type by @3Nya3 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/129
  • removed overlap of text and icon in input box & refactored input-base by @NicholasLin718 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/128
  • Add tooltip to GameIcon component by @ViridianCitrus in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/140
  • Loads fonts locally by @Ynng in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/142
  • Update ToastContainer to set icons in toasts based on toast type by @kevinzhangTT in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/150
  • Refactored File Viewer into more maintainable components by @Ynng in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/151
  • add restart button to InstanceCard by @seliayeu in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/148
  • fix: Learn more consistency on login form by @HananAlsawy in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/156
  • Left Navbar implementation by @NicholasLin718 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/152
  • New variable width design by @Arcslogger in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/81
  • fixed minecraft flavour types by @NicholasLin718 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/162
  • Made new instanceLoadingPill by @Ynng in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/164
  • hotfix for home until full design by @Arcslogger in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/166
  • left nav tweaks by @Arcslogger in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/167
  • Lodestone 0.4.2 by @Ynng in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/169

New Contributors

  • @3Nya3 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/129
  • @ViridianCitrus made their first contribution in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/140
  • @kevinzhangTT made their first contribution in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/150
  • @seliayeu made their first contribution in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/148
  • @HananAlsawy made their first contribution in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/156

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/compare/v0.4.1...v0.4.2

entry.title: New release for Lodestone: Lodestone Desktop v0.4.3
entry.content:
Downloads

  • Windows Installer
  • Windows Standalone
  • Mac (üöß experimental and untested)
  • .deb (üöß experimental and untested)
  • .AppImage (üöß experimental and untested)

Or - Launch in Browser (requires Lodestone CLI)

Notable Changes

We‚Äôre excited to introduce some awesome new features and improvements in this release. Here‚Äôs what you can expect: - Docker Support! Read more on our wiki page. - A new and improved instance setup screen, laying the groundworks for supporting more games in the future. - More settings on the setting page. Edit everything in server.properties through our graphical UI. - A handy player list that shows you who‚Äôs online. - A smart right-click menu in file viewer that lets you perform common actions like rename, delete, copy, and paste with a single click. - A convenient ‚Äúlast-command‚Äù feature in the terminal that lets you recall and execute your previous commands with the up arrow key. - Many bug fixes

Lodestone Dashboard

  • Fix instance highlighting bug by @ViridianCitrus in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/168
  • shortened button size and gap by @NicholasLin718 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/173
  • Update overview page top section by @ViridianCitrus in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/175

  • 145 Implement Minecraft player list component by @kevinzhangTT in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/176

  • 157 Unify errors into a single component by @kevinzhangTT in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/184

  • Add command line history by @ViridianCitrus in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/185
  • Add a right-click context menu to file viewer by @seliayeu in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/178
  • New dynamic settings [Merge this before "New setup dynamic forms"] by @NicholasLin718 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/189
  • Set overview as default tab and persist instance selection by @ViridianCitrus in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/190
  • Setup form styling [Merge this first] by @NicholasLin718 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/193
  • New setup dynamic forms by @NicholasLin718 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/187
  • add spring 2023 roadmap to readme by @Arcslogger in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/197
  • Overview and logged out state styling by @Arcslogger in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/194
  • No instance state by @NicholasLin718 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/195
  • 0.4.3 by @CheatCod in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/pull/191

Lodestone Core

  • ZIP by @jasonw930 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone_core/pull/118
  • Dev/refactor setup by @CheatCod in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone_core/pull/119
  • added playerlist to instance info by @Ynng in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone_core/pull/125
  • Fixed unzip duplicate folder by @jasonw930 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone_core/pull/127
  • Update dependencies in development instructions by @8Bitz0 in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone_core/pull/109
  • Fixed forge server not launching by @jasonw930
  • enable cross building workflow by @pinnouse in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone_core/pull/122
  • Releases/0.4.3 by @CheatCod in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone_core/pull/126
  • make vendored openssl build optional via a feature flag by @pinnouse in https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone_core/pull/128

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Lodestone-Team/lodestone/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3

entry.title: New release for Lodestone: v0.4.4
entry.content:
Downloads

  • Windows Installer
  • Windows Standalone
  • Mac (üöß experimental and untested)
  • .deb (üöß experimental and untested)
  • .AppImage (üöß experimental and untested)

Or - Launch in Browser (requires Lodestone CLI)

Notable Changes

  • A fully featured file explorer with copy, paste, zip and unzip capabilities
  • A slight rework for user permission and management
  • A bunch of bug fixes

entry.title: New release for Lodestone: v0.5.0
entry.content:
Downloads

  • Lodestone Desktop Windows Installer (üöß experimental)

  • .deb (üöß deprecating)

  • .AppImage (üöß deprecating)

Lodestone CLI with our web dashboard (www.lodestone.cc) is the recommended way to run Lodestone on any platform

Notable Changes

This is a new major release after 0.4.4, and marks the start of Lodestone's mission to be more extensible, maintainable, and support more games to come.

  • üéâplayit.gg integration by @seliayeu, never port forward again when using Lodestone. Learn more
  • üî• Write extensions in Typescript or Javascript @CheatCod. Learn more
  • üéä Customize macro setting with a GUI. @C0W0 @jhuang38
  • üêã Docker Instance is now WIP. Manage Docker containers with Lodestone! Learn more
  • Various UI improvements

Please be aware that are discontinuing support for the following platforms as of v0.5.0

  • MacOS x86 (Intel Mac)

due to lack of hardware and system for development and testing. If you would like to help out, get in contact with us by raising an issue or joining our Discord.

Report bugs and submit feature requests via issues or Discord

entry.title: New release for Lodestone: v0.5.1
entry.content:
Downloads

Lodestone CLI with our web dashboard (www.lodestone.cc) is the recommended way to run Lodestone on any platform

  • Lodestone Desktop Windows Installer (üöß experimental)

Additional downloads are available in the asset section. Note that they may be unstable.

Notable Changes

  • Fix EOF not handled correctly with the command console, causing our Docker container to print "Unknown command" endlessly.

Report bugs and submit feature requests via issues or Discord
